name: That's My Jam
description: Made for TrainJam 2019, That's My Jam is an exciting adventure game where you recover the most precious of all things - your dead grandma's last jar of award-winning jam.  Talk to fun characters! Pick up items!  Use items on things!  Do morally questionable actions that don't show any regard for the other characters' well being! Make baseless accusations!  The possibilities are endless (well... actually there's only one ending)!
